actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, so as to authorize furnishing of memorial markers for graves in private cemeteries wherein the remains of an honorably discharged serviceman are not recoverable.

summary.text: Removes the requirement that a veteran die in the service in order to be entitled to a memorial headstone or marker when his remains have not been recovered or identified, or have been buried at sea.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, so as to authorize furnishing of memorial markers for graves in private cemeteries wherein the remains of an honorably discharged serviceman are not recoverable.
